name: Shut Eye
summary: Shut Eye is a budget horror title which has you play as a child who's scared of the terrors of the night. Set entirely inside the child's bedroom, you have to keep your anxiety levels down basically by trying to ensure your flashlight is charged with fresh batteries.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: NS
  • 游戏类型: Horror
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年10月1日
